name: The Adventures of Awesome Man!
description:
Protect your Awesome-Tek, Throw Grenades, Survive 60 seconds

  • Move: A / D
  • Jump: Space
  • Quick Throw: Click Mouse
  • Power Throw: Hold Mouse and Release

Tools: Unity, Photoshop, Audacity

External Assets: Anima2d, EffectExamples (unity)

Credit to Fellblade for the amazing art.
